title: Defining Absolute Minimum
text: The absolute minimum of f at $$x=c$$ is f(c) where $$f(c) \leq f(x)$$ for all $$x$$ in the domain of f.

title: Absolute Minimum
text: The graph attains an absolute minimum at $$x=3$$, because it is the lowest point on the domain of the function’s graph.

title: Absolute Minimum
text: What is the corresponding y-value at $$x=3$$?
